pr_title: Rename package name for exporters to singular exporter

timeline.bodyText: Hm. I don't like underscores in package names. maybe io.opentelemetry.exporter.jaeger.thrift?
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Cannot do that I think, because of the java9 modules, the grpc is in io.opentelemetry.exporter.jaeger (which will "include" all submodules) so I think we cause a module conflict.
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I can move the grpc one to jaeger.grpc and this to jaeger.thrift that should be safe
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: Also fyi the checkstyle failed :)) cannot have "_" in the name :)). I used for the moment jaeger.thrift but can someone confirm if that is a problem or not with java9 modules?
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I believe that JPMS does not restrict sub-packages from being in a separate module, as long as each package is only exported by a single module. There's really no such thing as a "sub package" in java. There shouldn't be any issues. But, also, having .grpc for the other one sounds totally fine to me, as well.
replies.author: jkwatson
